text: and those self-employed. By the time his monthly salary arrived, the Inland Revenue had already taken their share, and there were precious few reductions in tax save for wives, children, life-insurances or any of the other normal encumbrances which Cecil had so far avoided.
handwritten_text: and those self-employed. By the time his monthly salary arrived, the Inland Revenue had already taken their share, and there were precious few reductions in tax save for wives, children, life-insurances or any of the other normal encumbrances which Cecil had so far avoided.
